#!/usr/bin/python2.7
import os, shlex, subprocess, sys
def add_tm_support_to_path(): sys.path.append(os.environ['TM_BUNDLE_SUPPORT'])
add_tm_support_to_path()
from p4python.P4 import P4 from perforce_bundle_helper import *
# Make sure that a new TextMate window is spawned to input the commit description into with the cursor on the right line os.environ['EDITOR'] = os.environ['TM_SUPPORT_PATH'] + '/bin/mate -w -l 25'
p4_response = run_p4_command('submit')
print(stdout_to_html(p4_response))
